sentences.sentence: British paleoanthropologists report the discovery of these 14,700-year-old skull-cups in the journal PLoS One.
sentences.translation: 英国古人类学家在PLoS One杂志报道他们发现了这些一亿四千七百年前的头骨杯子。

sentences.sentence: THE GREAT AGE of the Georgian hominids and the simplicity of their tools came as a shock to many paleoanthropologists.
sentences.translation: 乔治亚化石人的年代古老，石器又原始，令许多古人类学家都觉得震惊。
